com.team1389.system

Class Subsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.system.Subsystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompositeWatchable, Watchable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheesyDriveSystem, FieldOrientedDriveSystem, TankDriveSystem

    public abstract class Subsystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompositeWatchable
    a Subsystem stores a group of related tasks that can be run periodically when the SubSystem is attached to a SystemManager in addition, subsystems must be watchable, and should offer relevant information as subWatchables (see CompositeWatchable)
    Author:
    amind
